mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE (movie_Code, movie_Title, movie_Director, movie_Genre, movie_OpenDate, movie_Release) VALUES (#{movie_Code}, #{movie_Title}, #{movie_Director} ,#{movie_Genre}, #{movie_OpenDate} , #{movie_Release} )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_Code, movie_Title, movie_Director FROM MOVIE

SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_STILL, MOVIE_PLOT, MOVIE_OPENDATE, MOVIE_GRADE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'

SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_STILL, MOVIE_PLOT, MOVIE_OPENDATE, MOVIE_GRADE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_STILL, MOVIE_PLOT, MOVIE_OPENDATE, MOVIE_GRADE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영종료'

SELECT M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_GRADE, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_GENRE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_ACTORS, M.MOVIE_CODE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW MR WHERE MR.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM MOVIE M WHERE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}

SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_ACTORS, M.MOVIE_GENRE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW MR WHERE MR.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE ) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE M.MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}

SELECT R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.MOVIE_CODE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE L WHERE L.MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_OBJECT = R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM) AS MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT, (SELECT MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}) AS MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE R.MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode} ORDER BY MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_REVIEW (MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, MEMBER_ID, MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE) VALUES(movie_review_seq.nextval, #{memberId} , #{star} , #{reviewText}, #{movieCode}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, r.* from ( SELECT R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.MOVIE_CODE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE L WHERE L.MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_OBJECT = R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM) AS MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT, COUNT(*) OVER () AS review_cnt FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON R.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE) r where rownum < = #{end} ) where rnum > = #{start} and rnum < = #{end}
